title: Live at The Peak of City! Atlas Oakland
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 535-660 Sq.
As the first of its stature in Oakland, Atlas offers 40 stories of seamlessly blended history and premium, modern design.

With sweeping views, a unique attention to detail and thoughtfully curated experiences, these residences are not only redefining luxury high-rise living—they're also perfectly placed to put you right at the center of art, action, dining, culture and everything else downtown does best.

Full or Juliette balcony*, Nest thermostat, Garbage disposal, Frigidaire & Samsung appliances in some units*, Ceiling heights from 9 feet, Gas range, French door refrigerator, Bosch/Fischer & Paykel appliances in some units*, Privacy window shades, Floor-to-ceiling windows, In-unit washer & dryer

Yoga/Spin Studio, Sports & Media Lounge, Co-working Lounge & Meeting Rooms, Package Management System, EV Charging Available, Fitness Center, Sweeping City Views, BBQs & Pizza Oven, Curated Resident Events & Activities, 24-hour Courtesy Patrol, Coffee Bar, Terrace Pool & Spa with Daybeds and Firepits, Indoor/outdoor Club Lounge with Kitchen, Fitness Classes, Sunset Lounge with Cocktail Bar and Fireplace, Towel Service in Fitness Club, Rooftop Deck, 13, 000 Sq.
Ft. Terrace, Private Event Space, Al Fresco Dining Area, 24-hour Doorman, Dog Walking Space, Game Room
Dogs & Cats permitted (2) pet max per household
Oakland midrise high rise views penthouse luxury rental new downtown
